resources.string: - Cimma mafi daidaito tsakanin motsi da rayuwar batir ta hanyar daidaita yanayin wartsakewa.
"Wildlife thrives in Africa - home to many of the world's most famous animals."
Zaɓi sautunan kiran waya akan layi
The most biodiverse region on our planet often referred to as the \"lungs of the Earth\".
The orange-winged amazon is a large, noisy parrot that makes loud, high-pitched screams.
Ka na iya zaban har zuwa abubuwa 5
Yana hana fadada mai yawa kuma rage gajiyar ido cikin ƙananan yanayin haske
"A unique landscape populated by beautiful creatures who aren't afraid of the severe cold."
The Australian continent is a haven for rare endemic species.
The olive baboon lives in groups with developed social ranking depending on the dominance of each individual.
Bears are the largest land carnivores. They live in cold regions and are known for their keen sense of smell.
These birds often move in groups and fly short distances.
Sautin tunatar da aukuwa na aiki ma tunatarwa na kalanda, rubutu, da ayyuka
Capybaras are semiaquatic herbivore rodents who can hold their breath underwater for up to five minutes at a time.
Cheetahs are the fastest land animals with a flexible and complex social structure.

Its bright blue skin and poisonous glands are defense mechanisms to potential predators.

Babban tambari, babban rubutu, rage gani
"We've explored different ecosystems and recreated their distinct sounds. Start exploring the sounds of nature with us!"
Kangaroos have large, powerful hind legs and large feet adapted for leaping.
Elephants are the largest existing land animals. Ivory trade is one of the biggest threats to elephant populations.
Elks live in subarctic climates. They are browsing herbivores and are capable of consuming many types of plant or fruit.
Ka na iya kara abokanin ciniki har %d
Da alamar lokacin sistem ya canza. Ya kashe yanayin Mayar da hankali.
Adadin wartsakewa mafi girman na barin komai a bayyane kuma a bushe
Ana kunna tanadin batir. An saita adadin wartsakewa zuwa %d Hz.
Adadin wartsakewa mai yawa yana ƙara bayana bayanai
Wartsakewa na daidai yana Tanada karfin baturi
- Ana kunna waɗannan abubuwan rayarwar demo a ƙarancin gudu don tunatarwa. Aiki na zahiri na iya zama daban bisa dalilai daban-daban.

"%1$d. Domin ku fahimci bambancin da ke tsakanin mafi girma da ƙima na wartsakewa, ana kunna demos a hankali anan. Yana iya yi muku wahala lura da bambanci yayin amfani na yau da kullun. %2$d. A wasu lokuta, ƙila za a iya daidaita ƙarfin wartsakewa da ƙarfi bisa abin da aka nuna."
Babban adadin wartsake allo. Rage cin karfin batir.
Amfani da adadin wartsakewayana sa ƙwarewar gani ta yi laushi amma tana cin ƙarin ƙarfi.
Daidaita adadin wartsakewa da ƙarfi bisa yanayin yanayi don daidaita aiki tare da amfani da wuta
Yi amfani da sautin kira daka zaba ma kira daga masu oda da sabisin taksi. Wannan siffar zai yi aiki idan aka saita %s a matsayin sautin ringi na asali.
These large migrant birds often rob other seabirds from their catches.
The jaguar is largely a solitary, stalk-and-ambush predator at the top of the food chain.
The kinkajou is known for its nocturnal habits and a fully prehensile tail.
Kookaburras are known for their unique sounds and are good at hunting snakes and other reptiles.
Lions are fierce and powerful predators. They live in groups and have a strong sense of territory.

Adadin wartsake allo. Rage cin karfin batir.
The marabou stork is a massive bird, a frequent scavenger.
"Ba'a iya an yi lodin abubuwa ba"
Narwhals possess a large tusk and feed on benthic prey, mostly flatfish.
"Tasmanian native hens live close to water and aren't good at flying."

The Norway lemming dwells in tundra and fells, and prefers to live near water.
Ostriches are large flightless birds of Africa who lay the largest eggs of any living land animal.
Nuna dukan abun da allon ya kunsa a cikin launin gamut na P3
"The platypus is an important subject in the study of evolutionary biology. It's also one of the few species of venomous mammals."

"White rhino is a mighty herbivore with a gentle temperament. Quite rare today, it's on the verge of extinction."

Macaws are long-tailed, often colorful, New World parrots.

Nuna dukan abun da allo ya kunsa a cikin launin gamut mafi girma
White-tailed eagles are powerful apex predators and opportunistic scavengers who usually live near large bodies of open water.
Seals are marine mammals that can move quickly in deep waters, feeding on fish and shrimps.
Barka da zuwa Lokacin amfani da allo! Anan zaku iya saita iyakokin lokacin allo da duba ƙididdiga. Taba \"Fara\" don kunna wannan fasalin.
Hyenas are nocturnal predators with the most complex social behaviours.

Ya yi nasarar kashe Lokacin amfani da Allo
Dukan bayanan lokacin amfani da allo da izini, tare da saittuna na kowane, da kuma abubuwan da aka ajiye a gida da kuma aka daidaita tare da cloud zasu share bayan ka kashe wannan siffar.
"Za'a share dukan lissafin lokacin amfani da allo idan ka kashe wannan siffar"
Tasmanian devils are small carnivorous scavengers with a grumpy temper.

Toucans have large, colorful bills. They often make their nests in tree hollows.
Madanin gajeren hanya da aka kyautata zai taimake ka a wurin kauce wa tabo na hadari
Two-toed sloths can easily travel from tree to tree in the canopies of the rainforests.
Da alamar wannan iyaka na wannann lokaci yayi guntu fiye da na manhajar da kake amfani dashi a yau. Ya saita iyaka duk da haka?
%s na kusa kai wa ga iyaka na lokaci
Manhajar da aka zaba ba zai kasance ba idan aka kai iyaka
Ka riga ka yi amfani da wannan manhajar sau %s a yau.
Ka kai iyaka. Lokaci a kai!
Kar ka sa iyaka na yau
Wannan manhajar na bukatar isowa ga asusun bayananka domin nadin lissafin amfani na yanayin Mayar da hankali.

Idan ba ka yarda ka ba da wannan izini ba, ba zaka iya amfani da wasu siffofi na wannan manhaja ba; amma aikinsa na asali zai kasance. Ka na iya takaita izini koda yaushe ko soke ba da izini ko kin ba da izini a cikin Saittuna.
An yi nasarar ajiyewa a Galari
Yana na ba da mintuna don saukaka mayar da hankali.
Sa hankali na iya kasancewa na zagayowa.
Ci gaba da mayar da hankali na taimakonka a wajen gano siga mafi kyau.
Ka kai wuri mai nisa. Kar ka manta ka ci gaba da yi.
Tashi a bisan abun mai sauki
Samun jin dadi a cikin daidaito
Ci gaba da mayar da hankali
Na shiga Asusun Mi da daidaitawar lissafin lokacin amfani da Allo
"Na ganowar na'urarka ta hanyar amfani da VAID"

Barka da zuwa Lokacin amfani da allo! Kana iya amfani da wannan manhaja don saita iyaka na lokacin amfani da allo, duba lissafin, kuma ka canza zuwa yanayin Mayar da hankali. Wannan manhaja na bukatar tattara lokacin amfani da allo (misali adadin lambobi da ka bude wayarka da kunna allo, da kuma tsawon lokacin da kake amfani da manhaja) don yin aiki daidai.

"Barka da zuwa Loakcin amfani da Allo! Don yin aiki daidai, wannan manhajar na bukatara tattara bayanan lokacin amfani da allo: ana bukatar adadin sau nawan daka bude wayarka, sunan manhaja, da tsawon lokacin amfani da manhaja don bada lissafin lokacin amfani da Allo. Ana bukatar saittunan yanayin Mayar da hankali don bada lissafi na yanayin Mayar da hankali. Wannan manhaja na bukatar ya hada da intanit kuma na bukatar wadannan izinin domin tattara bayananka na sirri:"

"Barka da zuwa Loakcin amfani da Allo! Don yin aiki daidai, wannan manhajar na bukatara tattara bayanan lokacin amfani da allo: ana bukatar adadin sau nawan daka bude wayarka, sunan manhaja, da tsawon lokacin amfani da manhaja don bada lissafin lokacin amfani da Allo. Wannan manhaja na bukatar ya hada da intanit kuma na bukatar wadannan izinin domin tattara bayananka na sirri:"
"Don yin aiki daidai, wannan manhaja na bukatar tattara bayananka na sirri. Dole mu tattara bayananka na sirri bisa ga dokoki da, ka'idoji, da sharuddan bayanai."

"Dole mu kare bayananka na sirri bisa ga dokoki, ka'idoji, da sharuddan bayanai. Idan ba ka yarda ka bada wannan izini ba ko rabar da da aika bayananka na sirri, ba zaka iya amfani da wannan manhaja ba. Kana iya soke bada izini a cikin lokacin Amfani da Allo > Saittuna> Kashe lokacin amfani da allo."
"Kafin amfani da wannan manhaja, karanta kuma ka amince da Yarjejjeniyar Mai amfanin mu da Sharuddan Bayananmu."

"Dole mu kare bayananka na sirri bisa ga dokoki, ka'idoji, da sharuddan bayanai. Idan ba ka yarda ka bada wannan izini ba ko rabar da da aika bayananka na sirri, ba zaka iya amfani da wannan manhaja ba. Kana iya soke bada izini a cikin lokacin Amfani da Allo >Saittuna>Kashe lokacin amfani da allo. Idan kana da karin tambayoyi game da sharuddan bayanan sirri, kana iya tumtubar mu a privacy@xiaomi.com."
Saita iyakar lokacin allo na kullum ma manhaja

Bincika saittunan hanyar sadarwar ka sai ka kuma gwadawa
Waɗannan izini ana buƙata lokacin da kake amfani da ƙarin siffofi.

"Don samar muku da Lokacin amfani da allo da kuma lissafin Yanayin mayar da hankali, wannan manhajar yana buƙatar tattara wadannan bayanan: yawan lokuta da za ku buɗe na'urar, jerin ayyukanku tare da adadin amfanin da yake daidai, yawan lokutan da allonku yake daidai."

"Don samar muku da Lokacin amfani da allo da kuma lissafin Yanayin mayar da hankali, wannan manhajar yana buƙatar tattara wadannan bayanan: yawan lokuta da za ku buɗe na'urar, jerin ayyukanku tare da adadin amfanin da yake daidai, yawan lokutan da allonku yake haskakawa, da Saitunan yanayin Mayar da hankali."

"Wannan manhaja rna bukatar hadawa da intanit da tattara bayananka na sirri don iya aikin daidai. Don fahimtar da incin ka harda kuma hanyoyin da kake amfani da bayananka, karanta kuma ka yarda da Yarjejeniyar Mai amfani da Sharuddan Bayanan mu."
"Barka da zuwa lokacin amfani da allo! Wannan manhajar yana buƙatar haɗi zuwa intanet kuma yana buƙatar izini masu izini don iya yin aiki na yau da kullun:"
Lokaci ya kai! Ka kai iyakan ka.
Ka riga ka kai iyaka na lokacin amfani da bayananka na yau
Wani kuskure mara asali ya auku
Lokacin da ake bukata ya wuce
Na ajiye lissafin Lokacin amfani da allonka
"Karawa da kuma sharewa na fayil dake a cikin ma'ajir na'urar"
Waɗannan izini ana buƙatar su ne don siffofi na asali da sabis su kasance akwai.

"Kara katin ''Lokacin allo'' zuwa Ma'ajin manhaja don ka sarrafa lokacinka sosai."
"Saita iyakar lokacin allo na kullum ma na'urarka"

Walruses are excellent divers. They prefer shallow shelf regions and forage primarily on the sea floor.
Eastern whipbirds are native to the east coast of Australia.
The willow ptarmigan is herbivorous for most of its life and primarily occupies subalpine and subarctic habitats.
